txt.en: Orc sentries in Zhar Skator, west of Barad Angarth, hinder the plans of the Rangers and must be defeated.
Defeat Orc sentries in Zhar Skator ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'[placeholder], you continue to be a solid ally in this city most grim. Here is a small reward for your assistance.'

'Once again we ask for the resolution of a difficult task, and hope you are amenable to it!\n\n'The Orc encampment to the west poses a grave threat to us, and all attempts to push past it have been stymied by the sentries there. Make your way into the encampment and defeat any of these sentries that you encounter, and they will no longer hinder us.'
Defeated Orc sentries in Zhar Skator ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You defeated Orc sentries in in Zhar Skator.\n\nYou should seek out Dolenthol in the Orc encampment west of Barad Angarth and inform him of your success.

Orc activity in Zhar Skator hinders attempts to gather more information about the forces arrayed against the Rangers of Ithilien.\n\nDamrod asked you to defeat Orc sentries in order to allow easier passage further into the camp.
